name: auras-pay
description: AURAS Pay - Decentralized crypto payment gateway

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:landing" "npm run dev:wallet"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:landing" "npm run start:wallet"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../landingpage && npm install && cd ../walletPage && npm install
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build:frontend" "npm run build:landing" "npm run build:wallet"
scripts.deploy:landing: npm run build:landing && cp -r landingpage/out/* frontend/public/

author: AURAS Pay Team
